blog.name: randomguywithwords
blog.title: Writing about random stuff.
blog.description: Hi, I'm a teenager guy who likes writing so this is mainly for writing-related stuff. I rarely reblog except to answer writing prompts. I welcome any criticism or comments.

title: Midnight Train (Todomomo Short Story)
body:
“This is…” Momo stared uneasily at the station, as though it were a haunted house. 

“My birthday wish. Yes,” Todoroki responded.

“Is there some food in there you like, or are we going somewhere else? I can call for a ride –”

“No, we’re going to take a train. Come on.” Todoroki pulled Momo by the hand. 

“Wait, Shoto! I don’t –” 

“Feel comfortable? Of course not. I’d feel uncomfortable if I had to do something for the first time. But you said, and I quote, ‘we can go anywhere’ for my birthday, so here we are.” 

“I really regret promising that.” Momo pouted, and his lip curled into a smile. 

“Come on, it’s late, so no one will be taking it. No one will witness your embarrassment.”

“Shoto!” She slapped his shoulder, but as always, he didn’t even wince, dragging her to the ticket machine against her feeble protests. 

“Right, pick your stop,” Todoroki instructed. 

Momo sighed. “Just for you…and just this once, deal?” 

“Deal.” 

“Hmmph.” Momo scanned the map for her prefecture. “Aichi…Aichi…Aichi…” She muttered, waving her finger around to find the word. 

“Oh for crying out – Here,” Shoto sighed and pressed on the station that she’d been searching for.

“I would have found that,” Momo defended. 

“Sure…” Shoto replied with a tone of sarcasm he didn’t even try to conceal. “Anyway, pay up.” 

Momo dug into her jacket and pulled out her wallet. “200 Yen? That’s cheap.” 

“Of course it is. That’s the whole point.” 

Momo stuck her tongue out at him, and Shoto smiled at that. Knowing her, she wouldn’t have done that if they were in a crowded place. Currently, only a few people were still out and about at this time of the night, and Momo had definitely changed in the year and a half that they’ve been dating. 

“Your mom would pinch you for that,” He teased. 

“Well, she’s not here, is she?” 

He liked rebellious Momo. 

Once they paid for the tickets, they went up to the gantry. “So you insert the ticket into here, and then take the stub out here.” He pointed at the respective slots. “Then, when you exit, you put the stub here and walk through.”

He proceeded to demonstrate it, ending up on the opposite side of the gantry, leaving Momo behind and extremely confused. 

“Can I just jump over it?” She suggested, half-joking.

“Oh hurry up, or we’re going to miss the train.”

She vaguely remembered what Todoroki said a few seconds ago, and like a child inserting blocks in the form of shapes into their respective holes for the first time, managed to awkwardly bypass the gantry after a moment of deep thought. 

“So glad you made it, or you would’ve been stranded there forever.” Shoto said in a sardonic tone. 

“Shush,” Momo warned, and Todoroki obeyed, albeit chuckling lightly. They went up the escalator holding hands. 

“You know, people on the right generally walk up.” Shoto pointed out

“Yes, I know how escalator etiquette works, thank you very much. But there’s no one here, so there!” 

The platform was empty, apart from one drunkard at the other end sleeping on a bench, so the couple was alone. They sat down on a bench and enjoyed a comfortable silence in the chilly night, occasionally broken by the unexpectedly loud snores of the drunk guy or the announcements over the intercom. 

Finally, the train arrived, and the two boarded it. To no one’s surprise, it was empty. At least, that carriage was. Shoto spotted a few others scattered throughout the train in other carriages, but they were either sleeping or engrossed in their own things. 

 Momo zipped up her jacket suddenly.

“Cold?” Todoroki asked.

“No.” Momo replied, shivering slightly. 

He sighed. “You’re so stubborn.” He wrapped his left arm around her neck and heated it up. 

“I’m gonna get –” Momo yawned at the warmth. “Sleepy.”

“It’s a 20 minute ride anyway. You can get some shut-eye.” 

“What about you?”

“I’m awake.” 

Momo blinked a few times, her eyes growing heavy. “Okay…”

She leaned on Todoroki’s shoulder, the comforting heat emanating from his left side making her drowsier by the second. Todoroki tilted his head on Momo’s, murmuring with a smile forming on his face, “Sleepy-head.” 

“It’s your quirk’s fault,” She whispered, but there was no conviction, only affection. “Now let me sleep.” 

“Okay.” He kissed her forehead, causing Momo to purr softly as she closed her eyes.

Despite the screeching sounds of the train speeding along the rails and the occasional wobble of the carriage, and Momo with it, she managed to fall asleep feeling quite snug, with Todoroki’s warm turtleneck sleeves wrapped around her. She enjoyed her first train ride, but would never admit that to Todoroki. Even so, she knew he could tell. 

This is an odd request but if anyone has seen the tumblr post about finding a fanfic or the fanfic itself, please give me a link. It’s a one-shot about class 1a finding Deku’s notebook and discovering about OFA. Also Sato helps translate it or something. I can’t find it now.

title: Soft Tokoyami
body:
You were sitting outside on the dorm stairs. It was already late, but you couldn’t sleep and the weather was nice so you decided to sit outside for a bit.

“Do you even sleep?” you asked.

“Yes, but I do all my school work at night, because I can concentrate better,” Tokoyami said and sat down next to you.

“But doesn’t Dark Shadow make it difficult?”

Tokoyami shrugged and sat down next to you, turning his gaze to the night sky and taking your hand to his.

You two just sat there, silently enjoying each others company.

blog.name: all-for-gone
blog.title: Not Everyone can be a Hero.
blog.description:
¤ Villain Deku AU Roleplay.
¤Literate My Hero Academia roleplay, requests are open!

summary: "Is being a hero always a good thing? Having to always feel that you have to do the right thing for the sake of others?" Deku...
body: “Is being a hero always a good thing? Having to always feel that you have to do the right thing for the sake of others?” Deku scoffs and crooks his arm slightly, gazing towards the opposing person with a snide look in his eyes.“I’ve helped so much that all I feel now is pain. It’s almost a pleasure to me. But it feels so right. But yet you tell me that I am nothing more than a villain.But let me tell you, I am more than just that. I am your living nightmare.”

summary: since you said that todoroki would like an introverted/obedient s/o what would happen if he suddenly liked someone who was the...
question: since you said that todoroki would like an introverted/obedient s/o what would happen if he suddenly liked someone who was the opposite? Like extroverted, loud but super nice s/o? Headcanons pleeeease 😝
answer:
Owkiedokes anon ❣

Todoroki in a relationshp with an extrovert.

  • Would be a slow burn before you became a couple.
  • If your were that loud, he’d tried to ignore you but eventually you’d get under his skin.
  • You’d take him out everywhere and he’d always just come along with you
  • But when exams are coming up he’ll force you to sit down and review
  • “No, y/n, we’ll go to that chocolate factory another time”
  • “But shoto-”
  • “If you want you can go alone.”
  • “NoooooooOOOOooOo”
  • Your instagram stories would be filled with superzooms of todoroki
  • #mybeautifulboyfriend
  • Especially the hearts one
  • He’d also post one of you everyday
  • He’d like posting ones with you dancing, preferably in a boomerang
  • *wobble baby, wobble baby, wobble*
  • Or maybe a selfie of yours on his phone.
  • The whole class 1-A would probably be surprised that you two ended up together
  • “WHAT?! Todoroki and you? How- when did that happen?”
  • Always grabbing his hand whenever you’re next to him
  • Sometimes he’ll kiss your hand if nobody’s looking
  • Your loudness will probably rub on him a little bit too.
  • Some of the teachers will probably notice it but won’t say anything about it.
  • Getting teased by the whole class during each subject.
  • Mainly just you.
  • Your notebook would probably be flying towards whoever said that- ehem, bakugo
  • Your grades would improve and Todoroki would smile a lot more.
  • So Win-Win for the both of you.

reblog.comment:
Owkiedokes anon ❣

Todoroki in a relationshp with an extrovert.

  • Would be a slow burn before you became a couple.
  • If your were that loud, he’d tried to ignore you but eventually you’d get under his skin.
  • You’d take him out everywhere and he’d always just come along with you
  • But when exams are coming up he’ll force you to sit down and review
  • “No, y/n, we’ll go to that chocolate factory another time”
  • “But shoto-”
  • “If you want you can go alone.”

summary: Hey Everyone!!  So I recently hit 1,000 followers here on this writing tumblr and I’m SO excited and so honored that so many of...
caption:
Hey Everyone!!

So I recently hit 1,000 followers here on this writing tumblr and I’m SO excited and so honored that so many of you enjoy my writing and chose to follow me here! I’ve had a lot of fun writing across various fandoms and lately writing for BNHA has brought me so many good feelings and I feel so loved!

SO to celebrate I wanted to do a small little fic giveaway!

RULES:

Like/Reblog this post as many times as you want!

You don’t have to be following me, but it is preferred.

The giveaway will run from now until 11:59 PM PST on JANUARY 27TH!

I’ll pick THREE winners randomly from the pool of people who like/reblog this post!

The three winners will be allowed to request any fic from me (within the parameters of what I will write)! I do reserve the right to ask said winners to pick something different if I really feel it’s something I can’t handle!

THINGS I WILL WRITE:

*I’ll be keeping this to BNHA since it’s what I have a muse for now!*

Pairings: Kacchako, Todomomo, Kamijirou, Todobaku, Ochamomo, Dekulissa, Kirimina

Subjects: Fluff, Angst, Canonverse, AUs, A/B/O, NSFW (Certain kinks)

THINGS I WILL NOT WRITE:

Subjects: Age Gap, Incest, Non-Con, (Other various kinks) Character Death (potentially open for discussion), OCs (unless looking for kid fic then we could discuss) 

You can reblog this post from now until January 27th at 11:59 PM PST! Then I will be picking winners!

Thank you guys so so much for the massive support! I’m hoping to give some good fics back to you guys for being so awesome! <3

blog.name: inking-red

blog.description:
Masterlist

Matchups currently closed! Inking_in_red on instagram. I’m a writer and an artist! This bio will probably get longer as i go on. This blog is for my writing, characters, storyline and art. I do plan on taking art requests so go ahead and drop in my friends!

summary: Hi there! I was wondering if you would be able to do a bnha matchup for me please? I’m 5’4” female pale with curly long brown...
question: Hi there! I was wondering if you would be able to do a bnha matchup for me please? I’m 5’4” female pale with curly long brown hair and dark brown doe eyes. I am pretty extrovert and very friendly and sweet but I also enjoy quiet time reading and spending 1 on 1 time with people. I am a very happy individual but I’m also very sensitive and emotional and get anxiety. I love to swim, dance, act, and cosplay. Thank you so much for your time reading this! :)
answer:
HELLO! I match you witthhhh

Shoto Todoroki!

Your extroverted personality goes well with his quite cold one. But the fact that you’re able to calm down sometimes and be quiet also is what makes you two the perfect match. You two enjoy having 1 on 1 time by going out to coffee and sharing quiet sweet conversations of ridiculous topics like the meaning of life. He loves to watch you dance and sometimes tries to help you create your cosplays. One time he was helping you and managed to glue his hands together… it was not good. He loves your hair and is constantly running his fingers through it. I’m so sorry this took so long!

blog.name: phili-cheese-steak
blog.title: I'm a WHOLE damn meal
blog.description: | 🐯Philis🐯 | They/Them | nblw |   🌞♒️🌞 🌜♌️🌛 🌅♏️🌅 | DNI if Terf, Pedophile, or Kink Blog

body:
MomoTsuChako HC’s

• Tsuyu will find cute amphibian compilations and will share them with her girlfriends.

• Ochako does it to but all of her videos are just of Tsuyu being cute.

• Momo used her quirk to make Ochako a cute stylized pair of mittens for when she sleeps.

• When Ochako finds out she teaches Momo how to sew.

• Just starting she’s not really good at it but Ochako and Tsuyu wear everything she makes them anyway.

• They’ll hang out and watch “How It’s Made”

• This ones probably really weird but I love the idea of Ochako giving them cow licks.

• Just she’ll run up to Momo, jump in her lap being real lovey dovey and cuddly only to betray her by giving her a huge cow lick.

• Tsuyu starts doing it to and Momo has to avoid them before school so she doesn’t go to school with her hair sticking up.

• I also imagine that they’ll all go to the mall and Momo will insist on buying everything they want even if they have the money for it.

• And by insist I mean she’s buying it for them whether they want her to or not.

blog.name: shatter-days
blog.title: Sugar Honey Iced Tea
blog.description:
I ...uh.. draw stuff| drowning in bnha|sorry for being awkward.|ask me anything| requests are open💬
Instagram : @ anagrammed_art
twitter@shatter_days

body:
Just thought this ^^

@otps-and-brotps prompt 58

High school au where Person a and Person b don’t talk to each other normally but they happen to have a mutual friend. Eventually, A and B meet because they both sit with C at lunch and they immediately don’t like each other, thinking the other will steal C from them. Shenanigans ensue and that have a ton of silent competitions for C’s affection.
